titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, 9. November 1648. The Committee of Estates taking into their consideration that the putting of disaffected and malignant persons in places of trust or power in the severall shires and burghs of the kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
